name: Twinora
description:
Twinora is an anime-styled RPG where you clear dungeons, face unique monsters, and collect items to get stronger! Prepare to find treasure and learn new abilities throughout your journey with your best friend.

Key Features:
  • Grid-based combat with your party! Unleash powerful and flashy skills, together with the party members on your team. Use the power of fire and light against enemies, or switch characters to experience the adventure as your allies.

  • Explore unlockable dungeons. Reach new heights and undiscovered regions as you level up. Take on new enemies with unique behaviors and abilities.

  • Upgradeable weapons! Increase the stats of your weapons, by using the power of magical rocks called Star Stones.

  • Rare enemy and treasure chest rewards. Find treasure by defeating enemies in dungeons and opening treasure chests scattered throughout dungeons.
